entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@GOP @WhiteHouse He didn't act until he was briefed in the end of March about the bounties his BFF Putin put on American soldiers.
Acting on covid-19 was his way of covering what Putin was doing to our soldiers.
Trump is and will always be Putin's bitch!
#GOPCorruptionOverCountry
